Analytics & Business Intelligence

To become a world-class business intelligence and analytics delivery partner, and inspire the organization to push to the next level of information use. Our purpose is to intergrate data and centralize analyitics so business decisions are made with foresight. Through perspective decision making, Kaiser Permanente can continue to lead in a rapidly evolving healthcare landscape
